mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVE(RES_NUM, MEM_NUM, RES_TYPE, RES_DATE, PICKUP_DATE, REQUEST, DEL_DATE, RES_STATUS, PAY_STATUS, TOTAL_PAY) VALUES(SEQ_RESNO.NEXTVAL, #{memNum}, #{resType}, SYSDATE, #{pickupDate}, #{request}, #{delDate}, 'N', 'N', #{totalPay})
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NUM , RES_NUM , RES_TYPE , RES_DATE , PICKUP_DATE , REQUEST , DEL_DATE FROM RESERVE ORDER BY PICKUP_DATE ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVE WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memNum} AND PAY_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVE WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memNum} AND RES_TYPE = #{resType} AND PAY_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM RESERVE WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memNum} AND PAY_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY RES_NUM DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM RESERVE WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memNum} AND RES_TYPE = #{resType} AND PAY_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY RES_NUM DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT R.RES_NUM, R.MEM_NUM, RES_TYPE, RES_DATE, PICKUP_DATE, REQUEST, DEL_DATE, RES_STATUS, PAY_STATUS, TOTAL_PAY, L.LAU_NUM, L.CAT_NUM, LC.MCATEGORY, LC.SCATEGORY, LC.L_PRICE, LC.STATUS, RE.REP_NUM, RE.R_CATEGORY, RE.LENGTH_YN, RE.WIDTH_YN, RE.RESEAL_YN, RE.ZIP_YN, RE.R_PRICE, P.PAY_NUM, P.SUB_NUM, P.COU_NUM, P.CARD_ID, P.REFUND, C.CARD_NUM, C.CARD_COM, C.CARD_CVC, C.EXP_DATE, CO.COU_TYPE, CO.DISCOUNT , REV.REV_NUM, REV.REV_DATE, REV.REV_CONTENT, REV.RATE, ATT.ATT_NUM, ATT.ORIGIN_NAME, ATT.CHANGE_NAME, ATT.FILE_PATH, ATT.UPLOAD_DATE FROM RESERVE R LEFT JOIN LAUNDRY L ON (R.RES_NUM = L.RES_NUM) LEFT JOIN LCATEGORY LC ON (L.CAT_NUM = LC.CAT_NUM) LEFT JOIN REPAIR RE ON (R.RES_NUM = RE.RES_NUM) LEFT JOIN PAYMENT P ON (R.RES_NUM = P.RES_NUM) LEFT JOIN CARD C ON (P.CARD_ID = C.CARD_ID) LEFT JOIN REVIEW REV ON (R.RES_NUM = REV.RES_NUM) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT ATT ON (REV.REV_NUM = ATT.REV_NUM) LEFT JOIN COUPON CO ON (P.COU_NUM = CO.COU_NUM) WHERE R.RES_NUM = #{resNum} AND P.STATUS = 'Y'
